channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Break for Async User-Unhandled exceptions in the Visual Studio Debugger】Visual Studio 调试器中的异步用户未处理异常中断
item.description: 【Before .NET 9, the debugger was unable to track exceptions thrown from user-code async methods into non-user code framework methods, such as ASP.NET middleware. We are pleased to announce that you will now start seeing the debugger stop for these user-unhandled exceptions in your ASP.NET applications, as well as anywhere else this might happen! Summary […]】在 .NET 9 之前，调试器无法跟踪从用户代码异步方法抛出到非用户代码框架方法（例如 ASP.NET 中间件）的异常。我们很高兴地宣布，您现在将开始看到调试器因 ASP.NET 应用程序中的这些用户未处理的异常而停止，以及任何其他可能发生这种情况的地方！概括 […]

item.title: 【Askia, an Ipsos company, achieved faster, reproducible builds with vcpkg】Askia（Ipsos 旗下公司）使用 vcpkg 实现了更快、可重复的构建
item.description: 【vcpkg is a free and open-source C/C++ package manager maintained by Microsoft and the C++ community that runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Over the years we have heard from companies using vcpkg to manage dependencies at enterprise-scale. In this interview, I spoke to Dimitri Rochette, a lead developer at Askia, an Ipsos company, about […]】vcpkg 是由 Microsoft 和 C++ 社区维护的免费开源 C/C++ 包管理器，可在 Windows、macOS 和 Linux 上运行。多年来，我们听到一些公司使用 vcpkg 来管理企业规模的依赖关系。在这次采访中，我与 Ipsos 公司 Askia 的首席开发人员 Dimitri Rochette 谈论了 [...]

item.title: 【Does the Resource Compiler have a separate preprocessor or doesn’t it?】资源编译器是否有单独的预处理器？
item.description: 【It did, but now it doesn't.】曾经有过，但现在没有了。

item.title: 【Increase your Microsoft Teams app’s visibility and adoption with asynchronous link unfurling】通过异步链接展开提高 Microsoft Teams 应用程序的可见性和采用率
item.description: 【Learn how to leverage link unfurling for your Microsoft Teams app, now enhanced with asynchronous capabilities.】了解如何利用 Microsoft Teams 应用程序的链接展开，该应用程序现已通过异步功能得到增强。

item.title: 【Why is F# code so robust and reliable?】为什么 F# 代码如此健壮可靠？
item.description: 【F# is not just for math and big data, it's a general purpose language that will greatly reduce the amount of bugs in your code.】F# 不仅仅适用于数学和大数据，它还是一种通用语言，可以大大减少代码中的错误数量。

item.title: 【Go 1.23.1-2 and 1.22.7-2 Microsoft builds now available】Go 1.23.1-2 和 1.22.7-2 Microsoft 版本现已推出
item.description: 【A new set of Microsoft Go builds is now available for download.】一组新的 Microsoft Go 版本现已可供下载。

item.title: 【Add enhanced flexibility to your apps with custom claims on Native Authentication】通过本机身份验证的自定义声明为您的应用程序添加增强的灵活性
item.description: 【Discover how the custom claims feature, now available in public preview for Native Authentication on Microsoft Entra External ID, enhances your app's authentication process. This new capability allows you to tailor app behavior, based on specific user data, by allowing apps to dynamically add custom claims to authentication tokens via a custom claims provider during user sign-up or sign-in.】了解自定义声明功能（现已在 Microsoft Entra 外部 ID 上的本机身份验证的公共预览版中提供）如何增强应用程序的身份验证过程。这项新功能允许您根据特定的用户数据定制应用程序行为，方法是允许应用程序在用户注册或登录期间通过自定义声明提供程序将自定义声明动态添加到身份验证令牌。

item.title: 【Introducing the Data API Preview in vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB】在基于 vCore 的 Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB 中引入数据 API 预览版
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce the preview of the Data API for vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB. The Data API provides a flexible and powerful way to interact with your database through HTTP-based API calls. What is the Data API The Data API for vCore-based Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB allows you work with your […]】我们很高兴地宣布推出适用于基于 vCore 的 Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB 的数据 API 预览版。数据 API 提供了一种灵活而强大的方式，通过基于 HTTP 的 API 调用与数据库进行交互。什么是数据 API 基于 vCore 的 Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB 的数据 API 允许您使用您的 [...]

item.title: 【Learn to Build Your First Blazor Hybrid App!】学习构建您的第一个 Blazor 混合应用程序！
item.description: 【Learn all about the Blazor Hybrid workshop that you can follow yourself or teach to others!】了解有关 Blazor Hybrid 研讨会的所有信息，您可以自己学习或教授给他人！

item.title: 【Roadmaps for Microsoft Dev Box and Azure Deployment Environments are now live!】Microsoft Dev Box 和 Azure 部署环境的路线图现已上线！
item.description: 【We have just published the roadmaps for Microsoft Dev Box and Azure Deployment Environments! These roadmaps showcase our plans and upcoming features for both services, reflecting our commitment to enhancing your experience developing in the cloud. Your feedback is invaluable to us. We’ve built these roadmaps in a direct response to some feedback we’ve heard […]】我们刚刚发布了 Microsoft Dev Box 和 Azure 部署环境的路线图！这些路线图展示了我们对这两项服务的计划和即将推出的功能，反映了我们对增强您在云中开发的体验的承诺。您的反馈对我们来说非常宝贵。 我们制定这些路线图是为了直接回应我们听到的一些反馈[...]
